mapper.select: SELECT C.ID ID, C.TITLE TITLE, C.BODY BODY, C.CODE CODE, C.CREATED_AT CREATED_AT, C.LANG LANG, C.MEMBERID MEMBERID, IF(C.ANONYMOUS=1 AND M.MEMBERID!=#{memberid}, '익명', M.USERNAME) AS USERNAME FROM CODEREVIEW C, MEMBERS M WHERE C.MEMBERID=M.MEMBERID ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CODEREVIEW(TITLE, BODY, CODE, CREATED_AT, LANG, MEMBERID, ANONYMOUS) VALUES(#{title}, #{body}, now(), #{lang}, #{memberid}, #{anonymous})
